title: What is science education for? - Quora

response.answer_text: It teaches young minds the benefits, the history, and the journey of many branches of scientific inquiry and knowledge. How with each improvement in scientific knowledge, the quality of human life improved. It explains and elaborates the scientific method, which is the best tool humans have devised to test assumptions, formulate hypotheses, create experiments to probe the natural world, discover new facts, and add knowledge for the benefit of all people. It shows us how we might one day add to the growing body of knowledge. And it inspires us to do exactly that.

To help people understand what science is and how it works, and maybe to find people who have an interest in and talent for science. The reason our lives are so vastly different from these peoples’ live is mostly due to science.
